tp:errors.tp:docstring: Errors returned by the Secret Service API.

tp:error.name: AlreadyExists
tp:error.tp:docstring: An object (session, collection) already exists with the same name.

tp:error.name: IsLocked
tp:error.tp:docstring: The object must be unlocked before this action can be carried out.

tp:error.name: NoSession
tp:error.tp:docstring: A session must be established before this action can be carried out.

tp:struct.name: Secret
tp:struct.tp:docstring: The Secret type holds a (possibly encoded) secret.

tp:member.name: session
tp:member.tp:docstring: The session that was used to encode the secret.

tp:member.name: parameters
tp:member.tp:docstring: Algorithm dependent parameters for secret value encoding.

tp:mapping.name: ObjectPath_Secret_Map
tp:mapping.tp:docstring: A mapping from object-paths to Secret structs

interface.name: org.freedesktop.Secret.Service
interface.tp:docstring: The Secret Service manages all the sessions and collections.

property.name: Collections
property.tp:docstring: The object paths of all collections (ie: keyrings)

property.name: DefaultCollection
property.tp:docstring: The object path of the default collection, or an empty string if no collections exist.

method.name: OpenSession
method.tp:docstring: Open a unique session for the caller application.

arg.name: result
arg.tp:docstring: The object path of the session.

method.name: CreateCollection
method.tp:docstring: Create a new collection with the specified properties.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: Properties for the new collection.

arg.name: collection
arg.tp:docstring: The new collection object, or '/' if prompting is necessary.

arg.name: prompt
arg.tp:docstring: A prompt object if prompting is necessary, or '/' if no prompt was needed.

arg.name: attributes
arg.tp:docstring: Find secrets in any collection.

arg.name: unlocked
arg.tp:docstring: Items found.

arg.name: locked
arg.tp:docstring: Items found that require authentication.

arg.name: objects
arg.tp:docstring: Objects to unlock.

arg.name: unlocked
arg.tp:docstring: Objects that were unlocked without a prompt.

arg.name: prompt
arg.tp:docstring: A prompt object which can be used to unlock the remaining objects, or the special value '/' when no prompt is necessary.

arg.name: objects
arg.tp:docstring: Objects to lock.

arg.name: locked
arg.tp:docstring: Objects that were locked without a prompt.

arg.name: Prompt
arg.tp:docstring: A prompt to lock the objects, or the special value '/' when no prompt is necessary.

method.name: GetSecrets
method.tp:docstring: Retrieve multiple secrets from different items.

arg.name: items
arg.tp:docstring: Items to get secrets for.

arg.name: session
arg.tp:docstring: The session to use to encode the secrets.

arg.name: secrets
arg.tp:docstring: Secrets for the items.

arg.name: collection
arg.tp:docstring: Collection that was created

arg.name: collection
arg.tp:docstring: Collection that was deleted.

arg.name: collection
arg.tp:docstring: Collection that was changed.

interface.name: org.freedesktop.Secret.Collection
interface.tp:docstring: A collection of items containing secrets.

property.name: Label
property.tp:docstring: The displayable label of this collection.

property.name: Locked
property.tp:docstring: Whether the collection is locked and must be authenticated by the client application.

property.name: Created
property.tp:docstring: The unix time when the collection was created.

property.name: Modified
property.tp:docstring: The unix time when the collection was last modified.

arg.name: prompt
arg.tp:docstring: A prompt to delete the collection, or the special value '/' when no prompt is necessary.

method.name: SearchItems
method.tp:docstring: Search for items in this collection matching the lookup attributes.

arg.name: attributes
arg.tp:docstring: Attributes to match.

arg.name: results
arg.tp:docstring: Items that matched the attributes.

method.name: CreateItem
method.tp:docstring: Create an item with the given attributes, secret and label. If replace is set, then it replaces an item already present with the same values for the attributes.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: The properties for the new item.

arg.name: secret
arg.tp:docstring: The secret to store in the item, encoded with the included session.

arg.name: replace
arg.tp:docstring: Whether to replace an item with the same attributes or not.

arg.name: item
arg.tp:docstring: The item created, or the special value '/' if a prompt is necessary.

arg.name: prompt
arg.tp:docstring: A prompt object, or the special value '/' if no prompt is necessary.

signal.name: ItemCreated
signal.tp:docstring: A new item in this collection was created.

arg.name: item
arg.tp:docstring: The item that was created.

signal.name: ItemDeleted
signal.tp:docstring: An item in this collection was deleted.

arg.name: item
arg.tp:docstring: The item that was deleted.

signal.name: ItemChanged
signal.tp:docstring: An item in this collection changed.

arg.name: item
arg.tp:docstring: The item that was changed.

interface.name: org.freedesktop.Secret.Item
interface.tp:docstring: An item contains a secret, lookup attributes and has a label.

property.name: Locked
property.tp:docstring: Whether the item is locked and requires authentication, or not.

property.name: Attributes
property.tp:docstring: The lookup attributes for this item.

property.name: Label
property.tp:docstring: The displayable label for this item.

property.name: Created
property.tp:docstring: The unix time when the item was created.

property.name: Modified
property.tp:docstring: The unix time when the item was last modified.

arg.name: Prompt
arg.tp:docstring: A prompt object, or the special value '/' if no prompt is necessary.

method.name: GetSecret
method.tp:docstring: Retrieve the secret for this item.

arg.name: session
arg.tp:docstring: The session to use to encode the secret.

arg.name: secret
arg.tp:docstring: The secret retrieved.

method.name: SetSecret
method.tp:docstring: Set the secret for this item.

arg.name: secret
arg.tp:docstring: The secret to set, encoded for the included session.

interface.name: org.freedesktop.Secret.Session
interface.tp:docstring: A session tracks state between the service and a client application.

arg.name: algorithm
arg.tp:docstring: The algorithm the caller wishes to use.

arg.name: input
arg.tp:docstring: Input arguments for the algorithm.

arg.name: output
arg.tp:docstring: Output of the negotiation.

arg.name: complete
arg.tp:docstring: Whether the negotiation is complete or requires further calls.

interface.name: org.freedesktop.Secret.Prompt
interface.tp:docstring: A prompt necessary to complete an operation.

arg.name: window-id
arg.tp:docstring: Platform specific window handle to use for showing the prompt.

arg.name: result
arg.tp:docstring: The possibly empty, operation specific, result.

arg.name: dismissed
arg.tp:docstring: Whether the prompt and operation were dismissed or not.
